title: nIla mEgha shyAma
sahitya:
nIla mEgha shyAmA nirupama surAdi nI


anupallavi

  mAlAdhara gOpAla mAmava jAla nipuNa janArdanA vara


caraNam 1    gOpa yuvati sallApa mOhana pApa shamana surAdhipati
paripAlanA jaganmOhanA bhaktaranjanA sanga sEvita
    caraNam 2    asura bhanjana sarva sajjana AshrtAdbhuta abhayankarA
saumya sudarshana cakra nAyaka rAja pUjita yOga dAyaka
